          <title>
            <string language="en">Advice on Doing an Interview</string>
            <string language="es">Consejos para hacer una entrevista</string>
            <string language="ga">Comhairle maidir le dul faoi Agallamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rat auf dem Tun eines Interviews</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conseil sur faire une entrevue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conselho em fazer uma entrevista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Consiglio sul fare un'intervista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμβουλές για να κάνει μια συνέντευξη</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This will give you some tips on doing a task interview.</string>
            <string language="es">Este recurso ofrece algunos consejos sobre cómo hacer una entrevista.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tabharfaidh sé roinnt moltaí duit maidir le tasc agallaimh a dhéanamh.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </description>

une entrevue de charger.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto dar-lhe-á algumas pontas em fazer uma 
entrevista da tarefa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò vi darà alcune punte sul fare un'intervista
di operazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό θα σας δώσει μερικές άκρες να κάνει μια 
στοιχειώδη συνέντευξη.</string>
          </description>
